description: Damon Audigier, finally makes it back home to meet up with Remy LeBeau, who's just finished jacking off. But he's a horny 19 year old, so he's ready to go again, especially when he sees how hot Damon looks. The two guys start messing around and, just as Remy starts slurping on Damon's pole, Eric Austyn walks in and demands to get in on the action!
title: CitiBoyz 56: 'My Summer Vacation', Scene #05
